name: BRITISH AIRWAYS CLUB EUROPE | AIRBUS A319 | FRA-LHR
description:
A standard Club Europe intra European business class flight with British Airways. Here, I take the early flight into London Heathrow after a weekend of miles building. Enjoy the lounge, takeoff, breakfast, landing and the usual geographic tidbits in between.

I hope you like the video and find it useful....and don't forget to subscribe!
